transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Sir abhi mai ek ticket close karke ek aur ticket open kar rahi hu. Feedback dena aur meri senior abhi aapko call kar lengi.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai. To aap ek minute call kariye. Sir pehle to aapke paas ek ticket ka feedback aaya hoga mail pe usko please satisfied mark kar dijiye.
Customer: Haan ji mai kar dunga.
Executive: Abhi aap ek baar check to karo mail to check karo.
Executive: Fir ek open bhi karani hai na ticket bas ek minute ka hi kaam rahega.
Executive: Mail check karo aapke paas feedback aaya hoga.
Executive: Dekho maine likh bhi diya hai usme he want refund.
Executive: Isko please satisfied kar dijiye.
Customer: Maine kar diya.
Executive: Thik hai ab mai na ek aur ticket open kar rahi hu. Wait karo. Ji aap ticket karwa rahe ho lekin ho jayega na mera kaam?
Executive: Are sir ek minute ruko mai aap hi ke samne ticket open kar rahi hu.

Executive: Wait karo. Ashina.
Executive: Want refund as business closed.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai aapko 5-10 minute me update karti hu same number pe.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund as business is closed.

- Customer wants to know if his work will be done.



Resolution:

- Executive closed one ticket and opened another.

- Executive assured customer that she is opening ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer in 5-10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, ticket, business closed
